column4: Microsoft workers say judge who nixed sex-bias claims misapplied Dukes
column5: Women suing Microsoft Corp for sex bias have told a U.S. appeals court that their claims are suitable for class action treatment because they properly identified companywide policies that discriminate against women in pay and promotions.

column4: Elon Musk never sought approval for a single Tesla tweet  U.S. SEC tells judge
column5: Chief Executive Elon Musk has never sought pre-approval for a single tweet about Tesla Inc since striking a court-approved deal about how to communicate important information about the electric vehicle maker  the top U.S. securities regulator told a judge on Monday. | Video

column4: Nvidia partners with SoftBank to deploy cloud gaming servers in Japan
column5: (This story was corrected story to say "SoftBank Corp"  not "Softbank Group Corp"  partnered with Nvidia Corp in March 18 story.)

column4: CORRECTED-Nvidia partners with SoftBank to deploy cloud gaming servers in Japan (March 18)
column5: March 18 Chip designer Nvidia Corp said on Monday it has partnered with SoftBank Corp and LG Uplus Corp to deploy cloud gaming servers in Japan and Korea later this year.

column4: Fed Circuit trims research center's patent win against Cisco
column5: A federal appeals court on Wednesday significantly cut a jury verdict worth about $57 million that the research institute SRI International Inc had won against Cisco Systems Inc in a patent case relating to cybersecurity technology.
